entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Cambridge Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:57 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -42.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cambridge Bay Airport 01:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -42.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -58
Dewpoint: -46.5°C
Wind: NW 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 42. Wind chill near minus 58. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 37. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 37. Wind chill minus 57 in the morning and minus 52 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 39. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 52 in the evening and minus 57 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023
